title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The bug report is incomplete and lacks an explanation of the issue. Please provide more details about the problem.
OB: The dynamic text content type is not affecting the display of the db field content.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a db field with three types of content:
    a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags
    b) HTML fragments not within <html> tag
    c) Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Observe that the dynamic text content type has no effect on the displayed content.
